name: Crabasite
description:
Crabasite is a science fiction adventure game. You are a mercenary pilot in service of the imperial colony on Cryke2H23, whose inhabitants are quickly falling prey to a strange parasite. Your mission is simple: retrieve the cure to this infection from a stranded freighter. But what should have been a quick and easy fetch quest soon turns into a fight for survival when you discover that you yourself are infected.

Attraction

This game is designed with the theme of attraction in mind. Many gameplay elements and puzzles require that you use the parasite's abilities to attract and repel objects to solve the problems you are facing. Maybe this strange parasite has its uses after all. 

Make your own choice

How will this story of yours end? Will you come out alive? Will the colony be cured of their plight? Get to the end and make your own choice between three different endings to determine your destiny.

Features
  • A challenging combat system where you have to utilize telekinetic abilities
  • Careful exploration is rewarded with new gameplay mechanics instead of 5% more crit. damage
  • Fully original backgrounds and pixel art sprites
  • Completely handcrafted sound effects
  • Approximately 4.3k words with 3 endings
  • At least one very evil AI
Controls
  • WASD to move
  • LMB/RMB - Attract/Repel
  • SPACE - ultimate
  • E - interact/skip dialogue
  • I - inventory

System Requirements

Browser Version

  • WebGL 1.0 or 2.0 capable browser
  • HTML 5 compliant browser
  • 64bit OS
  • WebAssembly capable browser

Download Version

  • x86 / x64 CPU with SSE2 instruction set support
  • AMD Athlon 64 FX-57 // Intel Celeron G465 or better

These two are from 2005 and 2012. If your CPU can't run Crabasite you have other things to worry about...
